doc.title: Available variables
doc.page: : The variable is the URL object of the current web page. For details, see
doc.pageHost: : The domain name of the current web page
doc.isSameSubDomain: {{_isSameSubDomain_}}: The same domain name. Note that although the main domain names of {{_youtube_}} and {{_families_}} are both {{_mainDomain_}}, the subdomain names are {{_youtubeSubDomain_}} and {{_familiesSubDomain_}} respectively. So their domain names are different.
doc.clickpath: : The path of the clicked link
doc.minimatch: : {{_glob_}} matching method, using the {{_minimatch_}} library, usage method See , or you can search for {{_glob_}}.
doc.isSameDomain: : Whether it is the same domain name, {{_true_}} is yes, {{_false_}} is no.
doc.isSameParent: : Whether it is the same parent path, {{_true_}} is yes, {{_false_}} is no.
doc.isPageSublink: : Whether the current page is a subpage of the clicked link, {{_true_}} is yes, {{_false_}} is no.
doc.isPageMultilevelSublink: : Whether the current page is an infinite subpage of the clicked link, {{_true_}} is yes, {{_false_}} is no.
doc.isClickSublink: : Whether the clicked link is a sub-link of the current page, {{_true_}} is yes, {{_false_}} is no.
doc.isClickMultilevelSublink: : Whether the clicked link is an unlimited sub-link of the current page, {{_true_}} is yes, {{_false_}} is no.

returnVariables.title: Returnable variables
returnVariables.rightTab: : The link opens in a new tab on the right
returnVariables.leftTab: : The link opens in a new tab on the left
